root.name: Halo 4: King of the Hill Fueled by Mountain Dew
root.description: OverviewHalo 4: King of the Hill Fueled by Mountain Dew loosely features Halo 4's King of the Hill mode and involves as a key mechanic players scanning Doritos tortilla chips and Mountain Dew soft drinks at 7-Eleven stores to reload their in-game weaponry. Each 7-Eleven store also has an in-game leaderboard to display the highest scoring players of the game there. The game was originally released under the misspelt title "Halo 4: King of the Hill Fuled by Mountain Dew" and has received a generally negative reaction from fans and press who have stated that it constitutes distasteful marketing.
